betterquesting:10.desc:8:
In the Age of Mystery module, items can only be synthesized by unlocking the corresponding research. 
If you have all the materials but can't synthesize an item, try unlocking its corresponding research. 
\Q: Where can I find research? 
A:Magic manual, please open your magic manual to check, or you can use the search interface at the bottom left corner of the manual to search for the research you are looking for. 

Q:I can't find it
A: Like the achievements in older versions of minecraft, the research in the Age of Mystery is unlocked gradually, and some research needs to be unlocked through special conditions. 
\Q: What are the special conditions? 
A: Scanning certain items, traveling to certain dimensions, etc. 

Q:JEI shows that the item is ready to be crafted, but why does it still fail to be crafted? 
A: There is a bug in JEI's display of alchemy synthesis recipes that causes it to say that you have already unlocked the research when you open it, so please refer to the manual to see if you can craft a certain item or not. 

Q:Elemental Seeds can't be crafted
A:Elemental Seeds are prohibited from being used or crafted in this pack due to the gameplay experience being ruined.
betterquesting:10.name:8: Why can't I synthesize an item?
